rows.label: qst200205_msg0003
rows.name:
Grumbling isn't going to
solve anything. Come on,
explain to me what happened!

rows.label: qst200205_msg0004
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]Your eyes are straight and honest.
Harghal used to have eyes like
that too, back in the day[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200205_msg0005
rows.name:
I love dancing,
so I came to Avaritia
to make my dream come true.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0006
rows.name:
Harghal had the same dream,
so we became friends right away.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0007
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]So you really were close friends.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0008
rows.name:
Yes, that's right.
I was always together with her,
and we could talk about anything.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0009
rows.name:
But you see, her talent was the
real thing, and someone like me
couldn't even reach her feet.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0010
rows.name:
She was always shining, and I had no
choice but to be in that shadow.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0037
rows.name:
She was Chairman Bahn's big favorite,
and I was like an extra thrown in[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200205_msg0011
rows.name:
Being Chairman Bahn's favorite
meant better pay, of course.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0012
rows.name:
That girl received quite good
treatment, and I received
treatment befitting my status too.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0013
rows.name:
But, Chairman Bahn
lost his position, didn't he?

rows.label: qst200205_msg0014
rows.name:
To continue the dancing we loved,
we had to work in cafeterias
and bars like this.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0015
rows.name:
However, I was satisfied. I could
continue the dancing I loved anywhere.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0016
rows.name:
We couldn't live a gorgeous life
anymore, but as long as I was with
Harghal, the fun didn't change.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0017
rows.name:
But[ML:Dash ]
It seems Harghal wasn't like that.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0018
rows.name:
She immediately started leaking complaints
about this life, said she was quitting
dance, and ran away from Avaritia[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200205_msg0019
rows.name: Why was Harghal dissatisfied?

rows.label: qst200205_msg0020
rows.name:
Who knows? I'm already
sick of thinking about that girl.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0021
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]Then, do you know where Harghal went?
We are searching for her.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0022
rows.name:
She said she was returning
to her parents' home
in Alba Margen, but[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200205_msg0023
rows.name:
Superbia, huh[ML:Dash ]
Guess we'll try checking there next.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0024
rows.name: Hey, Couche.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0025
rows.name: You're still continuing dance, right?

rows.label: qst200205_msg0026
rows.name: Technically, yes[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200205_msg0027
rows.name:
Your passion for dance and
your feelings for your friend are real.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0028
rows.name:
So, if Harghal returns,
will you welcome her one more time?

rows.label: qst200205_msg0029
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]Talking with you helped
me sort out my feelings a little.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0030
rows.name:
Even I think that I want
to dance with Harghal again.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0031
rows.name: So, I'll give her one more chance.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0032
rows.name: That's what a best friend is.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0033
rows.name:
Heheh.
Take care of Harghal for me.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0034
rows.name:
If that girl still has the motivation,
bring her here.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0035
rows.name:
Harghal was Bahn's favorite,
good at dancing,
and pampered by everyone[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200205_msg0036
rows.name:
In the end, she betrayed me and
disappeared! I don't know anything
about a girl like that!
